description.ruby-sapphire:
A kick with a high critical-
hit ratio. May cause a burn.
description.emerald:
A kick with a high critical-
hit ratio. May cause a burn.
description.firered-leafgreen:
A fiery kick with a
high critical-hit
ratio. It may also
burn the foe.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user launches a
kick with a high
critical-hit ratio.
It may also leave the
target with a burn.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
effect.shortEffect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
